Text.Page:
I believe the plague hasn't spread to Frontera because they use a different well.

In order to confirm my hypothesis, however, I need you to go to the Quarantined Village and collect samples of their contaminated wellwater.

Leave them with {@LinkCreature:240#1035$$Narpa}.
Excellent! Now I can continue with my research. With luck, we'll find a way to end this.
We must have samples of the contaminated wellwater from the village! Pleaseâ€”we're counting on you.
